title: Option 2 Present Alternative Flow Modally Better
In the most straightforward implementation, the Onboarding flow can simply be presented in a modal context, since semantically the User is on a single journey.

inline_content.Text: In the most straightforward implementation, the Onboarding flow can simply be presented in a modal context, since semantically the User is on a single journey.

title: Consider creating a modal context only when it’s critical to get someone’s attention, when a task must be completed or abandoned to continue using the app, or to save important data.

inline_content.Text: Consider creating a modal context only when it’s critical to get someone’s attention, when a task must be completed or abandoned to continue using the app, or to save important data.

title: Presenting modally allows the simple option of dismissal at the end of the journey, with little of the cruft of swapping controllers.

inline_content.Text: Presenting modally allows the simple option of dismissal at the end of the journey, with little of the cruft of swapping controllers.

title: Custom transitions are also supported in the standard way, since this uses the
ViewController.present()
c
